There is a certain way to engineer our system, to make this body, to make this mind... the very chemistry within us the way we want it.

- Sadhguru

 

Dear {{FIRST_NAME}},

We hope you are progressing well with your Inner Engineering Online (IEO) modules and are enjoying imbibing Sadhguru’s wisdom and grace.

Upon completion of all 7 IEO modules it is possible to receive the Shambhavi Mahamudra kriya - a potent inner energy cleansing process that aligns the system and brings the body, mind, energy and emotions into complete harmony.

Participants of the Shambhavi Mahamudra program report:

  • Improved sleep quality, mental clarity & relationships
  • Increased energy levels & relief from chronic ailments
  • Ability to handle stressful situations effortlessly
  • Access to the intelligence and competence within
  • Greater peace and joy in everyday life

The program is offered over one and a half days, after which you will take home the Shambhavi Mahamudra Kriya - a powerful 21-minute process and continue your growth.

Upcoming Programs:

Sydney: 24 - 25 Sep 2016
Melbourne: 1 - 2 Oct, 2016

Register now to avail an Early Bird discount ($20 off) when you register for Shambhavi Mahamudra program before 24th August 2016.

Please note: Registration for the program will be made available to you after the completion of all 7 IEO modules.
Steps to register for Shambhavi Mahamudra Program
  • Login to the course using your IEO username/password
  • Finish all the 7 modules and the survey
  • You will notice a new "Shambhavi" tab on the top
  • Click on the Shambhavi tab and follow the instructions
